name: Super Smash Crusade
description:
Originally created by Falcon8r, Phantom 7, and Dr.MarioX, Super Smash Bros. Crusade is a large project built from the ground up and started by three die-hard Smash Bros. fans. Our goal is to create a Smash Bros. game packed with characters and stages from the most memorable video games of all time as well as create a Smash Bros. experience that combines the greatest features that all official Smash Bros. games have to offer and more!

Although you can play the game. It's still only in alpha. The game has yet to officially release.
